title: Winchester Natural Health. Naturopathic. Acupuncture. Bodywork.
description: Winchester Natural Health Associates provides safe and effective naturopathic, acupuncture, and bodywork therapies for all ages.
cleaned_text: top of page We address many acute and chronic health issues, including: Endometriosis/Menstrual Disorders GERD/Reflux Suspected/Verified Thyroid Disorder 10 Converse Place, Suite 101 Winchester, MA (781) 721 - 4585 OUR PRACTICE Natural Health Philosophy Our health care practice is committed to providing safe and effective natural therapies for patients of all ages, in a friendly and comfortable environment. We use drug-free, non-surgical treatments to help you get well and stay well. Our roots are based in tradition but our practice uses current, modern alternative treatments and functional medicine to help you improve your health. Winchester Natural Health Associates offers a variety of services for many types of health conditions including naturopathic medicine, acupuncture, and CranioSacral Therapy. Dr. Shiva Barton | Liz Allen, LMT News and Events Complementary Consultation I strongly recommend trying this place. We came here twice, with my one year old child, and a second time for help with my health issues that traditional medications resulted only side effects. In both cases our experience at Winchester Natural Health Associates was great." bottom of page
